channel.title: Too much code?

item.title: Too much code?
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

BASE: Project Insanity

I’ve wrote a statement that makes sure you have the runes require for the teleports + it checks if you have a staff. I’m just wondering if ALL of this code is necessary

This is the varrock teleport statement

case 4140: if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern"); c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(554,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3); } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.playerEquipment[Player.playerWeapon] == 1387) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern"); c.getItems().deleteItem(563,c.getItems().getItemSlot(563),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3); } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.playerEquipment[Player.playerWeapon] == 1381) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3214, 3424, 0, "modern"); c.getItems().deleteItem(554,c.getItems().getItemSlot(554),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(556,c.getItems().getItemSlot(556),3); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes for this spell."); } break;

Read full topic
